homeDescription: Gain valuable insights from student performance analysis.
featuresTitle2: comes with everything you need to analyze.
featuresSubdescription1: Get predicted student performance and encourage better outcomes.
featuresSubdescription2: Analyze all performance affecting student performance.
featuresSubdescription3: Easily predict values and obtain comprehensive information.
aboutDescription1: Our vision is to transform education through intelligent and strategic analysis. We strive to be leaders in educational innovation, providing institutions with advanced tools that enable them to make informed and proactive decisions for student success. We seek to collaborate closely with educational institutions to create an environment where each student is supported individually and guided towards academic and professional success. With our focus on excellence and innovation, we aim to be a benchmark in the field of educational improvement and student development globally.
aboutDescription2: Tara Smart Metrics is dedicated to empowering educational institutions to help every student reach their full potential. Our mission is to provide innovative analysis and tracking tools that enable institutions to identify and address student needs proactively. We work to ensure that each student begins their academic career successfully and completes it satisfactorily, offering smart and strategic solutions that drive the educational success of all students.
aboutDescription3: AI facilitates collaborative learning environments by providing personalized recommendations and adaptive learning experiences.
contactUsDescription1: Tara Smart Metrics is a software platform that utilizes advanced Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence techniques to assess students' academic performance. This system analyzes a set of specific metrics to determine the level of dropout risk for each student, enabling educational institutions to take proactive measures to maintain or even improve enrollment rates and student performance.
contactUsLocation1: Costa Rica, San Jose, Barrio Am√≥n, Ave 13, Calle 7.
contactUsLocation2: Republic of Panama, Ave Italia, Paitilla Gallery.
riskDetectorDisp: Our AI-powered Risk Detector for Student Analysis program for Learning Management Systems (LMS) uses predictive analytics to identify students at risk of dropping out or failing courses. By flagging these high-risk learners early, instructors and administrators can intervene with targeted support to help improve student retention and success rates across your institution.
numCredits: Number of credits enrolled per semester
financialSupport: Receipt of scholarships or financial aid
stuPerfDisp: Our AI-powered Student Performance Analysis tool for Learning Management Systems provides deep insights into student learning and outcomes. Analyze individual and cohort performance, identify at-risk learners, and uncover opportunities to optimize course content and teaching methods. Drive improved student success with data-driven decision making.
uploadDisp: Drag and drop file here, or click to select file
distOfAveAssessOnCourse: Distribution of Average Assessment on Course
dropOutAnalysisDisp: Our Drop Out Detector module proactively identifies students at high risk of course withdrawal or program non-completion. By analyzing learner engagement, performance, and other key factors, the tool flags potential drop outs early, enabling timely interventions to help keep students on track and improve retention rates across your institution.
retentionDisp: Our Retention Detector solution delivers deep insights to help you improve student persistence and completion rates. Uncover the drivers of attrition, identify at-risk learners, and evaluate the impact of support initiatives. Leverage data-driven recommendations to optimizelearning experiences and boost long-term student retention across your programs.

predictMessage2: This student may need some additional support to successfully complete the course.
